bundles.title: Modern Russian History
bundles.description: Questions covering key dates, topics and issues of pre, post and communist Russia.

Questions.1: What is the capital of the UK?
Questions.3: If you could be any animal, what animal would you be?
Questions.4: What is my favourite genre of music?
Questions.5: What's the real reason why people don't like Jazz?
Questions.6: What is the top Brexit Gezza?

Answers.2: Combination of freedom, simplicity and creativity in the game.
Answers.5: They fear it's lack of boundaries and structure.
Answers.7: The best beverage to ever exist!
